Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial broad clue collection and hypothesis generation listing possible location (Lisbon).
Divergent exploration enumerating multiple possible churches and viewpoints.
Continuing to list various church and viewpoint hypotheses without converging.

Depth-First.Explanation: Focused verification of architectural details to confirm church and viewpoint.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Dome-shaped cupola and pediment detail of Igreja de São Vicente de Fora.

Depth-First.Explanation: Systematic enumeration of specific image clues to support verification.
Depth-First.KeyElement: List of five enumerated key clues.

Depth-First.Explanation: Convergent analysis matching enumerated clues to Lisbon’s Alfama district.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Comparisons of riverbanks, station hall, church façade.

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from listing multiple hypotheses to focused verification of a specific church and viewpoint.
